name: Nagoya
description55: Nagoya Castle, JR Central Towers, Toyota Automobile Museum, Toyota Commemorative Museum of Industry and Technology, SCMaglev and Railway Park, Asahi Beer Factory, Nagoya City Science Museum, Osu Kannon Temple, World Cosplay Summit

name: Nara
description: The Historic Monuments of Ancient Nara, Todaiji Temple and Daibutsu (Big Buddha statue), Kasuga Taisha Shinto Shrine, Nara Park, Yoshino cherry blossom spot, Nara National Museum, Nara Park

name: Osaka
description: An urban area with a lively character and charm Points of Interest: Dotonbori (nightlife district), Osaka Castle, Osaka Aquarium Kaiyukan, Universal Studios Japan, Kuchu Teien Observatory, Sumiyoshi Taisha Shrine Famous Foods: takoyaki, okonomiyaki, yakiniku, kitsune (deep fried tofu) udon, taiko manju (a baked sweet filled with azuki bean paste that is shaped like a taiko drum)
